mapper.sql: SELECT id "id", username "username", password "password", name "name", phoneNM "phoneNM", email "email", registDate "registDate", status "status" FROM s1_user WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM s1_user u JOIN s1_user_authority a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.authority_id != 1 ORDER BY u.registDate DESC
SELECT * FROM s1_user u JOIN s1_user_authority a ON u.id = a.user_id ORDER BY u.registDate DESC
SELECT * FROM s1_user u JOIN s1_user_authority a ON u.id = a.user_id ORDER BY u.registDate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM s1_user u, s1_user_authority a WHERE u.id = a.user_id
AND LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND LOWER(u.username) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT * FROM s1_user u, s1_user_authority a WHERE u.id = a.user_id
AND LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND LOWER(u.username) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s1_user(username, password, name, phoneNM, email) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNM}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.subject, p.status, p.regDate FROM s1_post p JOIN s1_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM s1_post p LEFT JOIN s1_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{id} ORDER BY p.post_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(p.post_id) FROM s1_post p JOIN s1_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userid}
SELECT COUNT(p.status) FROM s1_post p JOIN s1_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userid} AND p.status = 1
